author: hship
msg: Lots of changes in the Vlib to make use of the new validating text field components.
Remove lots of unneeded package Makefiles.

msg: Fix some Javadoc errors in the new classes.

author: hship
msg: Remove many now unnecessary Makefiles from various packages.

author: hship
msg: Split the application into the application object and the visit object.
The visit object contains the server side state.
Remove the old constructors for AbstractComponent and BasePage.

author: hship
msg: More cleanups and improvements; support some additional user-define pre- and post-
Simplify the rules for compiling the JBE utility; extend it to support compiling
any additional Java files in the directory.
